# TextureResource.Compression.ASTCQuality.fast

**Case**

Compresses as fast as possible.

## Declaration

```swift
case fast
```

## Compression qualities

- **TextureResource.Compression.ASTCQuality.exhaustive**: Compresses optimally, achieving minor gains over high-level compression at the cost of much longer processing times.
- **TextureResource.Compression.ASTCQuality.high**: Compresses with a focus on quality, reaching close to optimal quality while still spending much less time than exhaustive-level compression.
- **TextureResource.Compression.ASTCQuality.normal**: Compresses with a good balance between quality and processing time.
